subs.text: June 24

@b05crypto @GOP It's just vanilla "White Christian Nationalism", not a theocracy. They still want all THEIR vices, just not yours or any for the brown people they hate. But now that they made it so everyone can carry a gun in their pocket, they may be have jumped the shark.

@b05crypto When you have only a 2 year term and your employment prospects are constantly in jeopardy, your focus is only your own re-election. Constantly. Pandering becomes a way of life. Don't forget you're complaining about a fundamentally broken system.
